content.rendered:
Directed By Vinayan

Written By Vinayan

Stars Siju Wilson (Aarattupuzha Velayudha Panicker). Poonam Bajwa (Queen of Travancore). Deepti Sati (Savithri Thampuratti). Madhuri Braganza (Katha). Chemban Vinod Jose (Kayamkulam Kochunni). Varsha Viswanath (Janaki). Sudev Nair (Padaveedan Nambi). Indrans (Kelu). Jaffer Idukki (Thandalkkaran Keshunni). Kayadu Lohar (Nangeli). Anoop Menon (Maharaja of Travancore). Alencier Ley Lopez (Chandrakkaran Raman Thampi). Gokulam Gopalan (Perumal). Vishnu Govindhan (Chaathan). Bibin George . Krishna (Kalyana Krishnan). Tini Tom (Kunju Pillai). Niya Sankranthil (Velutha). Baiju Ezhupunna . Senthil Krishna (Chirukandan). Sudheer Karamana (Chief of Travancore Army). Muhammed Musthafa (Kandappan). Renu (Neeli). Ramu (Diwan). Sphadikam George (Diwan Peshkar). M.B. Padmakumar . Vishnu Vinay (Kannan Kurup). Jayan Cherthala . Manikandan R. Achari (Bava). Harish Pengan . Salim Baba . Sreejith Ravi . Jayakumar Parameshwaran Pillai . Suresh Krishna (Panikkasseri Parameswara Kaimal). Sundarapandian . Raghavan (Eswaran Namboothiri). Manuraj . Koottickal Jayachandran . Adinad Sasi . Poojappura Radhakrishnan . Sunil Sukhada (Chandru Pillai). Biju Pappan . Shivaji Guruvayoor (Cherthala Naduvazhi). Adhil Raj (Kunju). Naseer Sankranthy . Scott Knox (Mr. Looper).

Language Malayalam

Producer Gokulam Gopalan

Production Sree Gokulam Movies
